metadata.name: Brian Lee

persona.name: Elena Petrova
persona.goal: Get help with intermittent internet dropping and be routed to support resources
persona.context: Lunch rush is impacted; staff can’t process orders reliably; needs troubleshooting steps or correct support path
persona.tone: Frustrated, short messages, wants resolution quickly

intent.name: Bundle Internet + TV + Voice for Business
intent.description: A new lead wants a bundle across multiple services (internet, TV, voice).
intent.goal: Confirm services needed, provide high-level guidance, and schedule a sales callback.
intent.initialMessage: Do you have business bundles for internet, TV, and phone? I want to get this installed soon.

emotion.name: Trusting
emotion.description: Shares details willingly (address, timeline), asks for recommendations, and follows instructions without much pushback.

metadata.outcome: Support path provided and sales appointment scheduled for Jan 14, 2026 at 10:00 AM ET.

turns.content: Do you have business bundles for internet, TV, and phone? I want to get this installed soon.
Our Business Class agent can give you full details on bundles. Would you like me to schedule a call so we can discuss your needs?

messages: Our Business Class agent can give you full details on bundles. Would you like me to schedule a call so we can discuss your needs?

turns.content:
Yes, please.  

I’m having ongoing internet drops at my restaurant and it’s messing up our lunch rush, so I’d like to talk about bundles and also get pointed to the right support to fix the current issue.  

Can we schedule a call for tomorrow at 10:00 AM Eastern? My name is Elena Petrova.

Thanks, Elena. I’m sorry the drops are hurting your lunch rush. I’ll set a call for tomorrow at 10 AM Eastern and share a support link for the issue.

Support: https://business.comcast.com/support/home/. Your call is set for Jan 14, 2026, 10:00 AM ET. You’ll get a text with the number to dial 5 min before.

messages:
Thanks, Elena. I’m sorry the drops are hurting your lunch rush. I’ll set a call for tomorrow at 10 AM Eastern and share a support link for the issue.

Support: https://business.comcast.com/support/home/. Your call is set for Jan 14, 2026, 10:00 AM ET. You’ll get a text with the number to dial 5 min before.

turns.content: Got it, thanks. I’ll use that support link today and wait for the call tomorrow at 10 AM ET.
